items.name: Empty water bottle
items.description: Just an empty water bottle. Maybe I can fill it up somewhere.

items.name: Full water bottle
items.description: Wow the water bottle is filled!! What do I do with it now?

items.name: Small key
items.description: This small key would probably only fit in a small treasure box or safe.

items.name: Rotating gear
items.description: Hmmm what could this be for...

items.name: Broken lever handle
items.description: I can't use this for anything. I should try to fix it.

items.name: Lever handle
items.description: Horray its fixed!! What do I do with it now...

items.name: A piece of paper
items.description: There seems to be something written on the paper.

characters.name: Timofey Mufasa
characters.dialogue: Woah this is you. Timofey Mufasa.

characters.name: Mysterious dude
characters.dialogue: Welcome Timothy. Your mission is to reach the criminal in the cellar.

characters.name: Linda Nada PÃ©rez
characters.bio:
- Half Filipino, half Serbian
- Speaks English and a tiny bit of Tagalog
- Age: 22 (DOB: 6.9.2002)
characters.dialogue: Kumusta? I mean, hello. If you want the cellar, find Leon or Tobias.

characters.name: Tobias Reviero
characters.bio:
- Half Trinidadian, half Czech
- Age: 20 (DOB: 10.4.2004)
- Likes: Dexter, Breaking Bad, Invincible
- Favorite bands: The Strokes, The Fratellis, RATM, Gorillaz
characters.dialogue: Yo. I'm busy watching Invincible, but the cellar is a mess.

characters.name: Leon Marcis Klamer
characters.bio:
- Half Polish, half African American
- Speaks English, Polish, understands Czech
- Age: 22 (DOB: 5.11.2002)
- Combat fighter and drinker
characters.dialogue: I bet I could kick that door down...but im too thirsty to do anything right now.

characters.name: The criminal
characters.dialogue: A criminal that deserves to be put down.

locations.name: Dark alleyway
locations.description: A foggy alleyway on the outskirts of a city

locations.name: Building hallway
locations.description: The hallway to an abandoned building.

locations.name: The garage
locations.description: A garage...this place might be useful.

locations.name: The balcony
locations.description: Theres nothing here except for fresh air and some scribbles on a note.
